content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Configuring Scan Now Settings Procedure Select the following options: Enable virus/malware scan Enable spyware/grayware scan Note You must enable virus/malware scanning before you can enable spyware/grayware scanning. Configure the Target settings. For more information, see Scan Now: Target Tab. Configure the Action settings. For more information, see Scan Now: Action Tab. Configure the Scan Exclusion settings. For more information, see Scan Now: Scan Exclusion Tab. Related information Scan Now: Target Tab Scan Now: Action Tab Scan Now: Scan Exclusion Tab Â© 2025 Trend Micro Incorporated.
